nowhere2gopp.gamelogic

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • nowhere2gopp.gamelogic.GameBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Playable, Viewable

    public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Playable, java.io.Serializable
    GameBoard class that implements the core logic of the Nowhere2gopp game. It is initalized with an integer that determines the size of the Gameboards. The Sites which are the platforms for the agents to jump around on, will be stored in a Wrapper class. The Links that connect the Sites with each other, will be left as SiteSets. Both the Sites and the Links are stored in a seperate HashMaps.
    Author:
    Benedikt W. Berg
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This Methode is given a Site, on which an Agent is placed, to check if its corresponding Node has any link with which it can reach another Site.
      private void gamePhaseChanger()
      This Methode is called towards the end of make().
      If the currentTurn is Blue, the rounds need to be incremented
      If the rounds are greater than PhaseOneRounds and the currentPhase is One the currentPhase is changed to Two
      If the rounds are greater than the incremented PhaseOneRounds and the currentPhase is Two the currentPhase is changed to Three
      Then with gameEndCondition(Site) it is checked if a gameending situation is reached.

      boolean pathFinder(Node start, Node dest)
      This Methode is given an origin and a destination between which a path is searched with searchPath(queue, dest).
      private void prepAgentLinkMoves()
      This Methode chooses with how many sites the moves for AgentLinkMoves are to be calculated.
      If the Gamephase is Two all possible Origin Sites need to be considered for all possible destinations, meaning for every origin Site find all possible destination Sites where the Agent can be Placed.
      If the Gamephase is Three only the already placed Agent needs to be considered for all possible destinations, meaning for the Agent find all possible destination Sites where the agent can jump to.
      To do this calculateAgentLinkMoves(Node...) is called with variable Arguments(varargs), of either all Sites,if Gamephase is Two, or, if the Gamephase is Three, the already placed Agent.
      private void processMove(Move move)
      This Methode is given a move that, depending on the Movetype, does the following:
      LinkLink: if currentPhase is ONE do makeLinkLinkMove(move).
      AgentLink: if currentPhase is not ONE do makeLinkLinkMove(move).
      default: the Movetype that was passed was Surrender so the player that called this move loses the game.
      java.util.LinkedList<Node[]> reachableSites(Site site)
      This Methode is given a Site which is used as origin to determine wich Sites can be reached from said origin.
      private void remove2Links(SiteSet linkOne, SiteSet linkTwo)
      This Methode is given two links that are then removed from the links map, with removeLink(link).
      private void removeLink(SiteSet link)
      This Methode is given a link that is then remmoved from the links map.
      private void removeNeighborReferences(SiteSet link)
      This Methode is given a link that symbolizes the neighbour relationship between the two Sites making up the link.
      void rollBackMove(Move move, java.util.HashMap<Move,Move> map)
      This method can roll back a AgentLink Move.
      boolean searchPath(java.util.ArrayDeque<Node> queue, Node dest)
      This method is given a queue and a destination.
      private void setAgent(PlayerColor color, Site dest)
      This Methode sets the current Position of the Agent oj color and if the currentphase is THREE, paint the last postion of the Agent White.
      Viewer viewer()
      This Methode returns the Viewer Object from Gameboard

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard(int size)
        Constructor of the GameBoard that is passed a integer k that determines the size of the Gameboard and the amount of rounds in the first Gamephase. The current status, Gamephase, turn and the Viewer are initialized and the links and Sites are created with createPossibleSites and createPossibleLinks(column,row) respectivly. The possible moves of Gamephase One are calculated with calculatePhaseOneMoves().
        Parameters:
        size - Integer that is stored in k and which is used to calculate the size and the amount of rounds of the first GamePhase of this board

    • Method Detail

      • createPossibleSites

        private void createPossibleSites()
        This method creates all possible Sites
           3-4-5
        
  2-3-4-4
        
 1-2-3-3-3
        
  1-2-2-2
        
   1-1-1
        
   
         e.q. Ascii board with n=5=2*k+1 k=2
 per iteration step the sites(see the ascii exp.) are createdcreateSite(int column, int row) in nummerologic
 order.
 First the 1s than the 2s etc.

      • createSite

        private void createSite(int column,
                        int row)
        This Method is called by createPossibleSites to construct the site with the given ints column and row. Than it is added to the Mapsites as part of a Node Object.
        Parameters:
        column - Integer of the Column of the Site.
        row - Integer of the Row of the Site.

      • createPossibleLinks

        private void createPossibleLinks(int column,
                                 int row)
        This method creates all possible Links recursivly. It gets two Integers(column,row), which are used to first create a Site and then are incremented to look for neighbours in sites with #containsNode(Site site). If said neighbour exists, the site and the neighbour are used to create a new Link. This Link ,if it does not already existscontainsLink(SiteSet link); will be put into links and this method calls it self with the incremented column and row.
        Parameters:
        column - column for Site creation
        row - row for Site creation

      • createLink

        private void createLink(SiteSet link)
        This method is given a SiteSet and puts it into links and it establishes the neighbour References between the two sites that make up the SiteSet with establishNeighbourReferences(Node,Node).
        Parameters:
        link - passed SiteSet that is stored in links

      • establishNeighbourReferences

        private void establishNeighbourReferences(Node nOne,
                                          Node nTwo)
        This method is given two Nodes Node which are neighbours. These add each other in there neighbours with addNeighbour(Node)
        Parameters:
        nOne - Node neighbour 1
        nTwo - Node neighbour 2

      • viewer

        public Viewer viewer()
        This Methode returns the Viewer Object from Gameboard
        Specified by:
        viewer in interface Viewable
        Returns:
        boardViewer variable of the Gameboard

      • make

        public void make(Move move)
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        This Methode is given a Move that is to be made on the GameBoard. If the Move is valid then it is processed with processMove(Move move). After that the gamePhaseChanger looks if the rounds need to be incremented and the Phase changed. If the the current phase is not One, then the possible moves need to be updated to contain the moves with Movetype AgentLink from prepAgentLinkMoves.
        Specified by:
        make in interface Playable
        Parameters:
        move - move to be made on the GameBoard
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the move is not in the possible Moves range this Exception is thrown

      • processMove

        private void processMove(Move move)
        This Methode is given a move that, depending on the Movetype, does the following:
        LinkLink: if currentPhase is ONE do makeLinkLinkMove(move).
        AgentLink: if currentPhase is not ONE do makeLinkLinkMove(move).
        default: the Movetype that was passed was Surrender so the player that called this move loses the game.
        Parameters:
        move - move that was passed from make(move)

      • gamePhaseChanger

        private void gamePhaseChanger()
        This Methode is called towards the end of make().
        If the currentTurn is Blue, the rounds need to be incremented
        If the rounds are greater than PhaseOneRounds and the currentPhase is One the currentPhase is changed to Two
        If the rounds are greater than the incremented PhaseOneRounds and the currentPhase is Two the currentPhase is changed to Three
        Then with gameEndCondition(Site) it is checked if a gameending situation is reached. Lastly the Turn is changed.

      • gameEndCondition

        private void gameEndCondition(Site site)
        This Methode is given a Site, on which an Agent is placed, to check if its corresponding Node has any link with which it can reach another Site. If this is not the case, the Player whose Agent it is loses the game.
        Parameters:
        site - Site on which an Agent is placed.

      • makeLinkLinkMove

        private void makeLinkLinkMove(Move move)
        This Methode is given a Move with MoveType LinkLink to make on the Gameboard. The neighbour relationships between the Nodes, whose connecting links are being removed, are terminated with remove2Links(link1, link2). The move, and all moves containing one of the links in the move, are then deleted out of the possibleMoves.
        Parameters:
        move - Move to be made.

      • removeLink

        private void removeLink(SiteSet link)
        This Methode is given a link that is then remmoved from the links map.
        Parameters:
        link - link to be removed from links map.

      • remove2Links

        private void remove2Links(SiteSet linkOne,
                          SiteSet linkTwo)
        This Methode is given two links that are then removed from the links map, with removeLink(link). The neighbour relationship between the links are terminated.
        Parameters:
        linkOne - link to be removed from links map.
        linkTwo - link to be removed from links map.

      • removeNeighborReferences

        private void removeNeighborReferences(SiteSet link)
        This Methode is given a link that symbolizes the neighbour relationship between the two Sites making up the link. The corresponding Nodes of these Sites remove thier neighbour relationship of eachother with removeNeighbor(Node).
        Parameters:
        link - that symbolizes the neighbour relationships between its sites

      • makeAgentLinkMove

        private void makeAgentLinkMove(Move move)
        This Methode is given a Move with MoveType AgentLink to make on the Gameboard. The neighbour relationship between the Nodes, whose connecting link are being removed, are terminated with removeLink(link). The new position of the Agent(redAgent,blueagent) on the Gameboard, with setAgent(currentTurn, destSite).
        Parameters:
        move - move that is to be made on the Gameboard.

      • setAgent

        private void setAgent(PlayerColor color,
                      Site dest)
        This Methode sets the current Position of the Agent oj color and if the currentphase is THREE, paint the last postion of the Agent White. The new Site of the Agent will be colored PlayerColor RED or BLUE.
        Parameters:
        color - color of Player whose turn it is
        dest - dest that is the new Position of the Agent

      • reachableSites

        public java.util.LinkedList<Node[]> reachableSites(Site site)
        This Methode is given a Site which is used as origin to determine wich Sites can be reached from said origin. Every tuple of possible origins and destinations is stored in an Node[] Array that is stored in a List that is returned.
        Parameters:
        site - Origin site from which reachable are searched
        Returns:
        List of Node[] Array that have tuples of origin and reachable Sites

      • calculatePhaseOneMoves

        private void calculatePhaseOneMoves()
        This Methode calculates all possible Moves of Gamephase One. For that it goes through all links and constructs LinkLinkMoves. These moves, and the Surrender Move, will be put in possibleMoves.

      • prepAgentLinkMoves

        private void prepAgentLinkMoves()
        This Methode chooses with how many sites the moves for AgentLinkMoves are to be calculated.
        If the Gamephase is Two all possible Origin Sites need to be considered for all possible destinations, meaning for every origin Site find all possible destination Sites where the Agent can be Placed.
        If the Gamephase is Three only the already placed Agent needs to be considered for all possible destinations, meaning for the Agent find all possible destination Sites where the agent can jump to.
        To do this calculateAgentLinkMoves(Node...) is called with variable Arguments(varargs), of either all Sites,if Gamephase is Two, or, if the Gamephase is Three, the already placed Agent. The Map that is generated contains all possible Moves of the Player. These are put in the possibleMoves.

      • calculateAgentLinkMoves

        private java.util.HashMap<Move,Move> calculateAgentLinkMoves(Node... nodes)
        This Methode is given variable Arguments(varargs) of the Type Node these are used as origin Sites. Then all possible destination Site are found with pathFinder(origin, destination) to which origin has a path and creates a new SiteTuple. This tuple is paired with all still exsisting links to create a new move that is valid given the passed origins.
        Parameters:
        nodes - varargs of Nodes to be used as origins
        Returns:
        Hashmap of created moves

      • pathFinder

        public boolean pathFinder(Node start,
                          Node dest)
        This Methode is given an origin and a destination between which a path is searched with searchPath(queue, dest). If there is a path than true is returned, else false.
        Parameters:
        start - origin that is the starting point of the search
        dest - destination of which a connecting path is searched
        Returns:
        returns true if a path exists, else false;

      • makeSitesWhiteAgain

        public void makeSitesWhiteAgain()
        This method is called when the Nodes in sites were recoloured in other methods like pathFinder or searchPath. All recoloured Nodes with paintWhite() so that the sites can be colored again.

      • searchPath

        public boolean searchPath(java.util.ArrayDeque<Node> queue,
                          Node dest)
        This method is given a queue and a destination. In the queue there is the origin from which a path to the destination is serached via Breath First Search.
        Parameters:
        queue - ArrayDeque with the origin placed in it.
        dest - destination of the serach
        Returns:
        true if a path to destination exists, else false

      • rollBackMove

        public void rollBackMove(Move move,
                         java.util.HashMap<Move,Move> map)
        This method can roll back a AgentLink Move. It is given the move that is to be reverted and the possibleMoves Map of the Player did the move. It recreates the link with createLink, decrements the rounds if the the turn of the blue player is to be rolled back and if the rounds are equal or lower than the phaseOneRounds the currentPhase is set to GamePhase Two. The move is than reverted, the possibleMoves are restored with possibleMoves Map and the status is set back to Ok.
        Parameters:
        move - move to be reverted
        map - possibleMoves Map how they where befor the move was done

      • copyMoveMap

        public java.util.HashMap<Move,Move> copyMoveMap(java.util.HashMap<Move,Move> copyDis)
        This method creates a deepCopy of the given move map
        Parameters:
        copyDis - map of moves that are to be deep copyed
        Returns:
        deep copy a map with moves
